question: What is Worklink?
answer: Worklink is an all-in-one job portal designed to connect job seekers with employers. Companies can post job openings, and users can browse and apply with ease. It offers a seamless experience for both sides, complete with secure login and a simple, modern interface.

question: How do I post a job?
answer: If you're an employer, simply log in and head to the 'Post Job' section. Fill in the job details and submit the form — your listing will be live in no time.

question: How can I search for jobs?
answer: You can explore jobs by entering keywords, selecting locations, categories, or using filters — all available right from the homepage or job search page.

question: How do I apply for a job?
answer: Click on any job listing to view the full details. Then, follow the on-screen instructions — typically uploading your resume and filling out a quick form — to apply.

question: Can I save jobs to apply later?
answer: Absolutely! Just click the 'Save Job' button on any listing. You’ll find all your saved jobs under your profile in the 'Saved Jobs' section.

question: How do I track my job applications?
answer: Your profile includes an 'Applications' tab where you can view all the jobs you've applied to, along with real-time status updates for each application.
